title: Jean Renoir - On purge bebe
description:
Jean RenoirÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s most outrageous comedy, based on a stage play by Georges Feydeau, provides ample material for its comic stars to prove their worth.   Marguerite Pierry, Jacques Louvigny and Michel Simon each provide a comic performance that surpasses genius, whilst a then comparatively unknown actor Fernandel unleashes his talent on an unsuspecting world.  Although not as noteworthy as RenoirÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s later films of the same decade, On purge bÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©bÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© is nonetheless a competently realised comic farce, showing the director at his most joyously unrestrained.  What links this film to Renoir's greater films is its carefree mockery of Bourgeois respectability, and seldom does the French Bourgeoisie come in for more mockery than in this hilariously funny film, all in the worst possible taste.
